infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SnapConnect needs access to your camera to take photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SnapConnect needs access to your microphone to record videos with sound.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SnapConnect to access your camera to take photos and videos.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow SnapConnect to access your microphone to record videos with sound.
